description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Create your own unique Xmas / New Year Cards! Send them to friends/family with and without Xbox. Your friends don't need to purchase the App to view your cards! Fun and easy - Try now!
